ProcurementProcedure.description: A series of activities leading to the conclusion of a public contract. Based on ePO.

Contract.description: The awarded contract resulting from a procurement procedure. Based on ePO.

Tender.description: A formal invitation to bid for a contract

ProcuringEntity.description: The organization conducting the procurement procedure. Based on ePO.

EconomicOperator.description: An organisation that can be a tenderer or sub-contractor. Based on ePO.

Criterion.description: A condition used for evaluation in a procurement procedure (e.g., award, selection, exclusion).

name.description: The name or title of the criterion.

description.description: A detailed description of the criterion.

type.description: The type of criterion (e.g., Award, Selection, Exclusion).

weight.description: The weight of the criterion in the evaluation process, if applicable.

Supplier.description: A company that can bid on tenders

HAS_TENDER.description: Links a procurement procedure to the tenders submitted for it.

SUBMITTED_BY.description: Links a tender to the economic operator that submitted it.

MANAGED_BY.description: Links a procurement procedure to the entity managing it.

HAS_LOT.description: Links a procurement procedure to its constituent lots.

APPLIES_TO_LOT.description: Links a tender to a specific lot it applies to.

HAS_CRITERION.description: Links a procurement procedure or a lot to its evaluation criteria.

lot_similarity.name: lot_similarity
lot_similarity.description: Calculate similarity between lots based on category and value

supplier_matching.name: supplier_matching
supplier_matching.description: Match suppliers to lots based on specialization

tender_risk.name: risk_assessment
tender_risk.description: Assess tender risk based on deadline and value

LOT_SIMILARITY.description: Similarity relationship between lots based on category and value

factors.description: List of factors used in similarity calculation

algorithms.name: LOT_SIMILARITY
algorithms.description: Calculate similarity between lots based on category and value

LOT_SIMILARITY.customQuery: MATCH (lot1:Lot)-[r:LOT_SIMILARITY]->(lot2:Lot) WHERE r.score > 0.6 RETURN lot1.name as lot1Name, lot2.name as lot2Name, r.score as similarity ORDER BY r.score DESC

algorithms.name: LOT_SIMILARITY
algorithms.description: Calculate similarity between lots based on category and value

similarity.customQuery: MATCH (lot1:Lot)-[r:LOT_SIMILARITY]->(lot2:Lot) WHERE r.score > 0.6 RETURN lot1.name as lot1Name, lot2.name as lot2Name, r.score as similarity ORDER BY r.score DESC
